articles.author: Sanjai P R
articles.title: Ratan Tata, Conglomerate Patriarch, Dies at 86 With No Successor - Bloomberg
articles.description: Ratan Tata, the businessman who inherited one of India’s oldest conglomerates and transformed it through a string of eye-catching deals into a global empire, has died. He was 86.
articles.content:
Ratan Tata, the businessman who inherited one of Indias oldest conglomerates and transformed it through a string of eye-catching deals into a global empire, has died. He was 86.
